title: Jam 2021: Community Programs
short_description: Meet staff whose outreach and partnerships keep the museum connected to the communities it serves.
header_description: Are you a college or university student eager to meet staff whose outreach and partnerships keep the museum connected to the communities it serves?
list_description: Are you a college or university student eager to meet staff whose outreach and partnerships keep the museum connected to the communities it serves?
description:
Speakers:

Nora Gainer, Director, Civic Relations and Partnerships
Erika Hubbard, Associate Director, Civic Relations and Partnerships
Kylie Escudero, Rights and Reproductions Specialist, Publishing

This program is meant for college and university students who want to learn about careers in the museum field from working professionals. Learn more about JAM 2021.
buy_button_caption: This free event is for college and university students only; registration required
